channel.title: Tutorial Section - Clean It Up?
channel.description:
Every since Mopar switched to SMF2, the tutorial section has been getting progressively worse. I want to know what you think about the lack of moderation in the tutorial section, I mean look at some of the threads floating around.
Computer Safety Clean up your messy code Making npc's not aggressive. How to make Rune Defender block emotes. paying a hoster every month READ IF U WANA MAKE MONEY
That's just the first page. I'm not usually one to complain, but the tutorial section is meant to be a place to learn, and that's a lot harder to do if there are random, horribly written, or incorrect threads filling the section up. What do you think?

item.title: Tutorial Section - Clean It Up?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I think it’s kind of hard for about 2 mods to do clean up the whole site and have their own time.

Read full topic
